content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: USUBJID
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value: DOMAIN
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.97
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: DM - One record per subject
Outcome:
  Message: USUBJID is not unique within DM
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Executability: Fully Executable
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG-DART
        Version: '1.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SEND Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '97'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: dm.xpt, Demographics - Special-Purpose Domains. One
                  record per subject, Tabulation.
                Document: IG v1.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 5.1.1
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '97'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: dm.xpt, Demographics - Special-Purpose Domains. One
                  record per subject, Tabulation.
                Document: IG v3.1.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 5.1.1
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '97'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: dm.xpt, Demographics - Special-Purpose Domains. One
                  record per subject, Tabulation.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 5.1.1
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.0'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '97'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: dm.xpt, Demographics - Special-Purpose Domains. One
                  record per subject, Tabulation.
                Document: IG v3.0
                Item: Specification
                Section: 5.1.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

Outcome.Message: USUBJID is not unique within DM

Citations.Cited_Guidance: dm.xpt, Demographics - Special-Purpose Domains. One record per subject, Tabulation.
